meanings.definition: Materials that do not absorb liquids.
meanings.sent1: The waterproof jacket is made of nonabsorbents materials.
meanings.sent2: The nonabsorbents fabric repelled the spilled juice.
meanings.sent3: The nonabsorbents sponge just made the spilled water dance on the counter.
meanings.sent4: Her nonabsorbents umbrella shielded her from the rain like a protective force field.
meanings.sent5: The nonabsorbents surface was as dry as the desert under the scorching sun.

meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed nonabsorbents to stop the medication from being absorbed too quickly.
meanings.sent2: The packaging of the food contained nonabsorbents to maintain freshness.
meanings.sent3: The nonabsorbents acted like little guardians, keeping the liquid inside the container.
meanings.sent4: His words were like nonabsorbents, leaving no impact on her emotions.
meanings.sent5: The nonabsorbents were like barriers, blocking any attempt at infiltration.

meanings.definition: Objects that resist soaking up moisture.
meanings.sent1: The nonabsorbents in the kitchen were perfect for drying dishes quickly.
meanings.sent2: The nonabsorbents in the bathroom stayed dry even after multiple uses.
meanings.sent3: The nonabsorbents in the garden hose made watering the plants a splashy affair.
meanings.sent4: The nonabsorbents in the carpet kept spills on the surface, making clean-up a breeze.
meanings.sent5: The nonabsorbents in the towel felt like magic, never getting wet no matter how many times it was used.
